E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 7/9/1973
Subject: Larry Gowell healing process
Larry Gowell is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Friday, 7/12/1973
Subject: Progress of Sergio Ferrer
Dear Sir,
Sergio Ferrer has nothing more to prove at A Lynchburg Twins!
He has an AVG of .412 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
